availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: P. S. Bush (Kenton County bank cashier)

body.p: Convington, Kentucky, bank cashier. Kentucky native. Married to Vicky Bush. Father of Eliza S. Bush, Julia A. Bush, Matilda T. Bush, Catherine A. Bush, John S. Bush, Elizabeth B. Bush, and Mary R. Bush. Bank cashier in Covington in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Covington in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 2, p. 243B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington.
